about.title: About us
about.paragraph1: Blacklist is an advanced technology platform using artificial intelligence to protect users from scam calls. We understand that phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam, with thousands of people losing money each year.
about.paragraph2: With AI voice recognition technology and machine learning, we analyze call content, detect common scam patterns and assess risk levels to help you make safe decisions. Our goal is to create a protective shield for every Vietnamese user.

risks.title: Are you at risk?
risks.description: Phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam. Every year, thousands of people lose money by believing in fake bank calls, prize notifications, or other tricks.
risks.risk1: Fake calls from "banks" requesting identity verification
risks.risk3: Requests for OTP codes or account passwords

features.title: Technology that protects you
features.description: Using artificial intelligence and machine learning to automatically analyze and detect scam patterns
features.feature1Desc: Advanced AI voice recognition technology converts calls to text with high accuracy, supporting multiple languages and Vietnamese dialects
features.feature2Desc: Deep analysis system identifies common scam tactics: bank impersonation, prize notification calls, requests for sensitive information
features.feature3Desc: ML algorithm calculates risk score from 0-100%, providing detailed warnings of suspicious signs to help you make safe decisions and protect your assets

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Just 3 simple steps to protect you from scams
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload call recordings or videos containing voice to be analyzed
howItWorks.step2Desc: System converts voice to text and scans for scam indicators
howItWorks.step3Desc: View transcript, risk score and warning list with specific explanations

info.title: How to use
info.point1: Click the "Record 15s" button and allow your browser to access your microphone.
info.point2: Speak for up to 15 seconds (or click "Stop Early" if you want to finish earlier).
info.point3: The audio file will be automatically uploaded and analyzed by the AI system.
info.point4: Results will show confidence score and reasoning within a few seconds.

intro.title: Commitment Statement
intro.content1: Blacklist is a community project built with the sole purpose of protecting Vietnamese users from scam calls. We absolutely commit to not collecting, storing, or sharing any personal information of users.
intro.content2: This project serves community purposes, strictly complying with personal data protection regulations under Vietnamese law.

purpose.title: Purpose of Use
purpose.content1: Blacklist is developed with the following purposes:
purpose.point1: Serve the community: Provide tools to help users detect scam calls
purpose.point2: Educate users: Raise awareness about phone scam tactics
purpose.point3: Protect the community: Contribute to reducing damage caused by scams

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Storage
dataCollection.warningContent: We absolutely commit to NOT storing any user data on servers or databases. All information is only temporarily stored on your browser.
dataCollection.content1: Blacklist operates entirely on your browser (client-side). All data is stored locally on your device through standard web technologies:
dataCollection.localStoragePoint1: User email (if logged in) - only stored on your browser
dataCollection.localStoragePoint2: Personal profile information (name, email) - only stored on your browser
dataCollection.localStoragePoint3: Analysis history of uploaded files - only stored on your browser

dataUsage.title: How Data is Used
dataUsage.content1: Since all data is stored locally on your browser, we cannot and will never use your data for any purpose. Your data:

allowed.title: Allowed
allowed.point2: Help you manage your analysis history

notAllowed.title: Not Allowed
notAllowed.point1: Not sent to servers or databases
notAllowed.point2: Not shared with any third parties
notAllowed.point3: Not used for commercial or advertising purposes

compliance.title: Compliance with Vietnamese Law
compliance.content1: Blacklist strictly complies with personal data protection regulations under Vietnamese law, including:

laws.title: Relevant Legal Documents
laws.point3: Circular No. 20/2017/TT-BTTTT of the Ministry of Information and Communications

contact.title: Contact
contact.content1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

footer.title: Final Commitment
footer.content: We commit to continuing to maintain the principle of not storing user data. This project will always be a tool serving the community, with no commercial purposes or data collection. Any changes to the privacy policy will be clearly announced on this website.
